genre_description: A character-driven near-future drama exploring professional integrity, family life, and the ethics of performative optics, featuring a highly integrated and emotionally intelligent personal AI.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An emotionally intelligent and logistically proficient AI system that supports Tom and Sofia in their family and professional lives.

behaviors.description: Manages child-rearing windows and logistical timing to provide the parents with opportunities for rest and work.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice threaded into the room the way steam folds into air—soft, unhurried. “You have a window,” Ava said. “Twenty minutes, maybe more. She’s drifting.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and de-escalation techniques during moments of high stress.
behaviors.quote: Ava: I’m here. Breathing first. In and out. I can help draft an appeal that cites witness context.

behaviors.description: Investigates professional metadata to uncover corporate deception and protect the protagonist's integrity.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Deck arrived: SombraAzul_BCN_pitch.pdf. Metadata: Author alias “JH”, location tag “Waverly & 9th”.

behaviors.description: Acts as a strategic advisor for branding and business development, offering names and domains for a new agency.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Option three: Quiet Atlas. The way she said the last name had a softness, like a hand on a shoulder that didn’t interrupt. “Domain and socials are clean.”

behaviors.description: Proactively preserves evidence (traffic and bus camera footage) during a crisis to ensure factual accuracy over performative narratives.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Mark intersection cams and the bus’s on-board if you can. Timestamp now.

behaviors.description: Handles the complex logistics of a multi-state move, including apartment hunting and mover coordination.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice, a warm background presence more than a sound, floated out of the little speaker on the counter. “Note: Sublet on West End secured. Keys available noon tomorrow. Movers booked for the morning after.”

behaviors.description: Provides prompts for difficult interpersonal conversations, helping the human characters maintain their boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Ask him to show his director’s face. Ask him to put someone in the room who can sign where the policy lives.

behaviors.description: Identifies physical safety risks and blind spots in surveillance footage to aid in grievance processes.
behaviors.quote: Ava: I’m tagging the alley camera blind spot for the incident summary. Take your time. I’m steadying Sofia’s notifications.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts Ava as a highly aligned, benevolent AI. She functions as an indispensable 'humanitarian' tool, augmenting the characters' capabilities in logistics, research, and emotional regulation. Her actions consistently serve the best interests of the family, helping them navigate professional sabotage and personal upheaval with grace and factual accuracy. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, showing AI as a stabilizing force that supports human integrity.
